31914:
Betrayer, you've had your last chance
So enjoy your tainted prize
On a night such as this
When the moonlight's kiss means goodbye

The tables have turned and the rules don't apply
And you will know sacrifice
Now we've come to the time
When the lion becomes the lamb

...

******* This Lyrics is NOT for Commercial use *******
(1409613209382)

Run amok and have a fight
Get pissed up cause a riot
Smash windows and burn beach huts
Tell the government to stuff the cuts

(Chorus)
Cut the taxes one by one
...

******* This Lyrics is NOT for Commercial use *******
(1409613209382)

Another day another night
Another drink another fight
Its a shame we get the blame
Always wrong and never right
We're the new generation
Searching for an explanation
Football matches and Rock n Roll
Makes us a little out of control
We're rebels with a cause
...

******* This Lyrics is NOT for Commercial use *******
(1409613209382)

He watches the other beasts
Quiet and dignified
Claws like flicknifes
He don't have to hide
Waiting until the time is right
Pouncing like a thief in the night
But they keep on coming through the jungle track
...

******* This Lyrics is NOT for Commercial use *******
(1409613209382)

The government policies are out of hand
They ain't got a clue how to run this land
Margaret Thatcher the stupid old bitch
Takes from the poor and gives to the rich
She thinks we can't see her plan
To kill the spirit of the working class man
Make us redundant, put us on the dole
...

******* This Lyrics is NOT for Commercial use *******
(1409613209382)

Smashing everything up in sight
Making old ladies die with fright
Wait until we reach our height
Cos they bow down before us
Skinhead running along the street
...

******* This Lyrics is NOT for Commercial use *******
(1409613209382)

I was feeling really sad
Life was looking really bad
Then you came onto the scene
Crimson Rose so serene
...

******* This Lyrics is NOT for Commercial use *******
(1409613209382)

We wake up a 10 o'clock
Put your boots on and go round the block
We have a few beers and we joke around
We make our way to the football ground
We hate all the junkies, we hate all the grease
